description: This TypeScript file defines an Angular standalone component named LinkComponent, which renders a stylized link that can function as a navigation link or an action button within a login or registration form. It supports attributes such as text, href, routerLink, disabled, and action, and emits an event when clicked.

classes.name: LinkComponent
classes.description: An Angular component that renders a styled link capable of acting as navigation or action button, with configurable behavior and appearance.

methods.name: onKeydown
methods.description: Handles keyboard events to allow pressing Enter or Space as activation keys for accessibility.

methods.name: handleClick
methods.description: Handles click events, emitting a 'clicked' event if enabled, and managing navigation or button behavior.
